definition: to die of old age/to live to a ripe old age/(fig.) (of sth) to come to an end (after a long period of service)
to die of old age/to die in one's bed at a ripe old age

sentences.english: My job is to collect souls when their time has come, " the dead servant replied."
sentences.chinese: 我的任务是当人们寿终时收走他们的灵魂。

sentences.english: Run, and you'll live… at least a while.
sentences.chinese: 逃跑，至少能苟且偷生，年复一年，直到寿终正寝。

sentences.english: There's the person Napoleon,a space-time worm that came to an end in France.
sentences.chinese: 有一个叫拿破仑的人，一个时空蠕虫在法国寿终正寝。

sentences.english: What the Demise of Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac Means for the Future of Homeownership?
sentences.chinese: 房利美和房地美的寿终正寝对房主的未来意味着什么？

sentences.english: Death bed,goes to sleep,goes unconscious,whatever it is.
Run, and you will live at least a while.
sentences.chinese: 逃跑，至少能苟且偷生，年复一年，直到寿终正寝。

sentences.english: The Xia Dynasty of China ended and the Shang dynasty began.
sentences.chinese: 中国的夏王朝寿终正寝而商王朝开始了。

sentences.english: Roughcast room to "rest" is a strong reaction.
sentences.chinese: 毛坯房要“寿终正寝”引起的反应是强烈的。

sentences.english: Run, and you'll live at least a while.
sentences.chinese: 逃跑，至少能苟且偷生，年复一年，直到寿终正寝。

sentences.english: Indeed, he predicts the Fed’s demise sometime in the next ten years.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，他预测美联储将会在今后十年内寿终正寝。

sentences.english: Industrial policy would mark the end of the free-enterprise system as we know it.
sentences.chinese: 工业政策会促使我们所熟知的自由企业制度寿终正寝。

sentences.english: Soon after spawning, the adult Pacific salmon will expire.
sentences.chinese: 产卵之后，大马哈鱼很快也就寿终正寝了。

definition: to die of old age/to die in one's bed at a ripe old age
see 駕鶴西去|驾鹤西去[jia4 he4 xi1 qu4]
lit. to fly on a crane to the Western Paradise/fig. to pass away (idiom)
approaching one's end/with one foot in the grave
to die/euphemism, lit. to return West or to the Western Paradise
to die in a seated posture (Buddhism)
to die/future incarnation/next life/to be born/to come into the world/future generation
